languages.text: "Помнишь погрузочную платформу, что заедала постоянно? Мы из-за нее на горбу грузы таскали, когда простыми работягами были".

traits.locale_text: "Помнишь погрузочную платформу, что заедала постоянно? Мы из-за нее на горбу грузы таскали, когда простыми работягами были".

languages.text: "Remember the loading dock that used to seize up all the time? We used to have to carry cargo on our backs when we were just labourers."
languages.original_text: "Помнишь погрузочную платформу, что заедала постоянно? Мы из-за нее на горбу грузы таскали, когда простыми работягами были".

traits.locale_text: "Remember the loading dock that used to seize up all the time? We used to have to carry cargo on our backs when we were just labourers."
"Remember the loading dock that used to seize up all the time? We used to have to carry cargo on our backs when we were just labourers."
"Remember the loading dock that used to seize up all the time? We used to have to carry cargo on our backs when we were just labourers."
"Remember the loading dock that used to seize up all the time? We used to have to carry cargo on our backs when we were just labourers."
"Remember the loading dock that used to seize up all the time? We used to have to carry cargo on our backs when we were just labourers."

languages.text: «¿Te acuerdas del mecanismo de carga que se bloqueaba cada dos por tres? Cuando trabajábamos aquí siempre nos deslomábamos acarreando cajas».
languages.original_text: "Remember the loading dock that used to seize up all the time? We used to have to carry cargo on our backs when we were just labourers."

traits.locale_text: «¿Te acuerdas del mecanismo de carga que se bloqueaba cada dos por tres? Cuando trabajábamos aquí siempre nos deslomábamos acarreando cajas».

languages.text: 「昔、荷揚げドックがよく壊れていたのを覚えているか？私たちがまだ労働者だった頃は、荷物を背負って運ばなければならなかったんだ」
languages.original_text: "Remember the loading dock that used to seize up all the time? We used to have to carry cargo on our backs when we were just labourers."

traits.locale_text: 「昔、荷揚げドックがよく壊れていたのを覚えているか？私たちがまだ労働者だった頃は、荷物を背負って運ばなければならなかったんだ」

languages.text: “还记得那个装货码头吗？那里的机器总是出问题，所以咱们还在当劳工的时候，总是不得不靠人力背货。”
languages.original_text: "Remember the loading dock that used to seize up all the time? We used to have to carry cargo on our backs when we were just labourers."

traits.locale_text: “还记得那个装货码头吗？那里的机器总是出问题，所以咱们还在当劳工的时候，总是不得不靠人力背货。”

languages.text: "Erinnerst du dich an das Verladedock, das sich ständig verklemmt hat? Wir mussten die Fracht auf dem Rücken tragen, als wären wir einfache Arbeiter."
languages.original_text: "Remember the loading dock that used to seize up all the time? We used to have to carry cargo on our backs when we were just labourers."

traits.locale_text: "Erinnerst du dich an das Verladedock, das sich ständig verklemmt hat? Wir mussten die Fracht auf dem Rücken tragen, als wären wir einfache Arbeiter."

languages.text: « Tu te rappelles la plateforme de chargement qui n'arrêtait pas de se bloquer ? On avait pris l'habitude de porter la cargaison sur notre dos, quand on était encore de simples ouvriers. »
languages.original_text: "Remember the loading dock that used to seize up all the time? We used to have to carry cargo on our backs when we were just labourers."

traits.locale_text: « Tu te rappelles la plateforme de chargement qui n'arrêtait pas de se bloquer ? On avait pris l'habitude de porter la cargaison sur notre dos, quand on était encore de simples ouvriers. »

languages.text: "Tıkanıp duran yükleme rıhtımını hatırlıyor musun? İşçiyken mecburiyetten yükleri sırtımızda taşırdık."
languages.original_text: "Remember the loading dock that used to seize up all the time? We used to have to carry cargo on our backs when we were just labourers."
